MvpLceActivity<CV extends View,M,V extends MvpLceView<M>,P extends MvpPresenter<V>> - Class in com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.lce
A MvpActivity that implements MvpLceView which gives you 3 options: Display a loading view: A view with R.id.loadingView must be specified in your inflated xml layout Display a error view: A TextView with R.id.errorView must be declared in your inflated xml layout Display content view: A view witjh R.id.contentView must be specified in your inflated xml layout
MvpLceActivity() - Constructor for class com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.lce.MvpLceActivity

A MvpFragment that implements MvpLceView which gives you 3 options: Display a loading view: A view with R.id.loadingView must be specified in your inflated xml layout Display a error view: A TextView with R.id.errorView must be declared in your inflated xml layout Display content view: A view witjh R.id.contentView must be specified in your inflated xml layout
MvpLceFragment() - Constructor for class com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.lce.MvpLceFragment
 
MvpLceView<M> - Interface in com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.lce
A MvpView that assumes that there are 3 display operation: MvpLceView.showLoading(boolean): Display a loading animation while loading data in background by invoking the corresponding presenter method MvpLceView.showError(Throwable, boolean): Display a error view (a TextView) on the screen if an error has occurred while loading data.
